messages.subject: Re: Complete and Utter Unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: ... Yup! :-) http://groups.yahoo.com/group/RadChristianUnschoolers/ We chose that name because there are lots of Christian unschooling lists out there that
messages.messageBody:
--- In UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com, Earthmomma67@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 4/28/2005 12:39:03 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
> UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
> I think that's b/c of Susan and Stephanie's
> RadChristianUnschoolers list and their list description.>>>>>>>
>
> ****Thanks for plugging the list :)
>
> Stephanie in PA
> Do you have a link?
>


Yup! :-)

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/RadChristianUnschoolers/

We chose that name because there are lots of Christian unschooling
lists out there that sound an awful lot like "eclectic" or "relaxed"
homeschooling instead of allowing unschooling to permeate every area
of life.

~ Susan (of the Susan and Stephanie show <wink>)
